mapper.update: update tb_thanks set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, nick_name, username, money, info, email, state, pay_type, order_id, date from tb_thanks
